per_frame_1=echo_orient=(bass+treb+mid*10%4);
per_frame_2=q2=bass+treb+mid;
per_pixel_1=zoom=zoom+((int(rand(2))*int(rand(10))*rad*bass*.05)*rad);
warp_1=`shader_body {
warp_2=`float2 uv1 = float2(uv.x-0.5,uv.y-0.5);//*aspect.xy;
warp_3=`
warp_4=`
warp_5=`float2 zz = uv1 *texsize.xy *q28;
warp_6=`
warp_7=`zz =mul(zz,float2x2(_qb));
warp_8=`
warp_9=`float2 h1 = clamp(tan(zz.yx),-16,16) * cos(zz*2*q9);
warp_10=`
warp_11=`uv.xy += h1 * .01;
warp_12=`
warp_13=`float r = tex2D (sampler_noise_hq,uv/6 + .001*time).x*16;
warp_14=`float2 uv6 = uv1;
warp_15=`float sr = sin(r); float cr = cos(r);
warp_16=`uv6 = mul(uv6, float2x2(cr,sr,-sr,cr));
warp_17=`float3 mus = 1/(sqrt(uv6.y)) * ((.5-q30)+.03*q26);
warp_18=`
warp_19=`float3 crisp = tex2D(sampler_main,uv) + .02*mus;
warp_20=`//crisp = lerp(crisp, crisp.bgr, saturate(crisp));
warp_21=`ret = crisp-.0 -.3* GetBlur3(uv) - rad/10 ;
warp_22=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`//Code bits by Flexi and Geiss
comp_5=`
comp_6=`    float2 d = texsize.zw*8;
comp_7=`    float1 dx = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) ).y;
comp_8=`    float1 dy = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) ).y;
comp_9=`    float2 uv_y = uv+float2(dx,dy)*0.55;  
comp_10=`    float2 uv_y2 = (uv_y*1.25)-.125;  
comp_11=`
comp_12=`  
comp_13=`    ret = lerp(ret,1-ret,.7*GetBlur1(uv_y)+.2*GetPixel(uv));
comp_14=`    ret = lerp(ret,ret-.1*GetBlur3(uv_y)+.1*GetBlur1(uv_y2)+.42*GetPixel(uv_y),.25);
comp_15=`    //ret *= .75;
comp_16=`    ret *= saturate(length(ret-0.5)*5);
comp_17=`    //ret = ret.xy;
comp_18=`    ret = lum(ret);
comp_19=`    ret += 1.25;
comp_20=`    ret *= ret*.45;
comp_21=`    float3 mask = GetBlur3(uv)-GetBlur1(uv)-.25*GetBlur2(uv_y);
comp_22=`    ret *= lerp(ret,1.3*ret*mask,pow(hue_shader.zxy,q2*(1-ret)));
comp_23=`    ret += .05;
comp_24=`    ret *= 1.1*ret;
comp_25=`    ret *= (hue_shader*4)-2.75;
comp_26=`    ret *= 3.5-.5*saturate(ret);
comp_27=`
comp_28=`}
